### <ins>**R**</ins>

#### **Packages**

<a target="_blank" href="https://amitjavilaventura.github.io/chromHMMviewR/">**crhomHMMviewR**</a>: ggplot2-based functions that draw heatmaps from ChromHMM output data.

#### **Shiny apps**

<a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/DPomics">**DPomics**</a>: shiny app designed to visualize omics data from the Pasini Lab (RNA-seq and ChIP-seq). *ongoing*

<a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/DNApp">**DNApp**</a>: simple shiny app with several DNA-related tools. *ongoing*

<a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/DNAme">**DNAme**</a>: shiny app designed for learning purposes that converts a word to a DNA sequence.
